author: Denny Page
releaseNotes:
4.0.1: When debugging, log individual fields of device and variable events
4.0.0:
 Add failsafe call to writeQueuedDataToInfluxDb when new events are queued
 Remove migration support for versions prior to 3.0.0
3.3.2: Add warning about special characters in Database, Org and Bucket names
3.3.1: Remove default values for Influx Version and Authorization Type
3.3.0: Add support for Hub Variables
3.2.1: Fix powerSources capability
3.2.0: Don't send null units to InfluxDB
3.1.4: Fix issue with soft poll interval being unset
3.1.3: Fix valve attribute
3.1.2: Fix issue of quotes appearing in hub name tag
3.1.1: Always treat valid numbers (such as buttons) as numeric values for InfluxDB
3.1.0:
 If post of size one fails, log the actual failed record
 Ignore momentary attributes for keep alive
 Display full uri in config page for convenience
3.0.0:
 Unify advanced and non-advanced device selection processing
 Enhance queueToInfluxDb and softpoll for batch processing
 Remove unnecessary state variables
 Improve backlog warnings
 Lower backlog limits to prevent issues with app database size
 Normalize Hub information logging
